EmailTemplate.subject: NCS with The Challenge: Please submit a response to your contract
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team. Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Congratulations on being offered a role on NCS with The Challenge. We hope you are excited about your wave and looking forward to meeting the young people you will be supporting.
We have noticed you have not yet submitted a response to your contract. Please submit a response urgently or you may not be able to undertake your role.
Click here to login to the website https://staffing.the-challenge.org/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fsecure%2fMyRole.aspx
Please submit a response to all contracts within 24 hours of receiving this notice.
If you feel you are missing your contract please contact your local staffing representative quoting the email reference number in any correspondence.
Many thanks for your cooperation. NCS with The Challenge
Follow us on Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn
CCR 20
